meanings.definition: Somewhat soft but not completely soft.
meanings.sent1: The pillow was semisoft, providing just the right amount of comfort.
meanings.sent2: The cake was baked perfectly, with a semisoft texture that melted in your mouth.
meanings.sent3: The semisoft cheese tried to do a somersault off the plate, but it landed back safely.
meanings.sent4: Her semisoft smile hid the pain she was feeling inside.
meanings.sent5: The semisoft clay was easy to mold into intricate shapes.

meanings.definition: A food that is partially soft in texture.
meanings.sent1: The bakery sold a variety of semisoft pastries that were always fresh.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed snacking on semisoft fruits like peaches and pears.
meanings.sent3: The semisoft bread bounced off the table and onto the floor, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: The semisoft tofu soaked up the flavors of the stir-fry like a sponge.
meanings.sent5: The semisoft ice cream melted quickly under the hot sun.
